discussiontools-defaultsummary-reply:
Default edit summary for a reply.

'''Note that this is a noun (''a reply''), not a verb (''to reply''). Alternatively you can use a past tense verb if that's more natural in your language.'''
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: Error message. Parameter: $1 – text of the 'Edit'/'Edit source' tab
discussiontools-error-lint:
Error message. Parameters:
* $1 – URL to documentation on mediawiki.org
* $2 – URL to talk page on mediawiki.org
* $3 – URL to the editor (action=edit)
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-exten: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-table: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-templ: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-title: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Warning message shown when leaving the title field empty while adding a new topic to the page.
discussiontools-newtopic-placeholder-tit:
Placeholder describing the heading field of a new topic
{{identical|Title}}
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-:
Notification header text for when there is a reply on a topic. Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the user who replied to the topic
* $2 - the username for gender purposes
* $3 - title of the page
* $4 - title of the topic.

Notification header text for when there is a multiple replies on a topic. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of replies for display
* $2 - the raw number of replies, for PLURAL
* $3 - title of the topic.
{{Related|discussiontools-notification-bundle}}
Label for button to view a comment that was just posted.
discussiontools-preference-description:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as description for the checkbox to enable discussion tools as a Beta Feature.

The label for this checkbox is {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-label}}.
discussiontools-preference-discussion-li: {{optional|Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can discuss this Beta Feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}
discussiontools-preference-info-link: {{optional|Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can learn about this Beta Feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]] in the section titled {{msg-mw|prefs-discussion}}, in the same list with:
* {{msg-mw|Discussiontools-preference-replytool}}.

Used as label for checkbox to enable the new topic tool.

The help text for this checkbox is: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-help}}
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool}}
discussiontools-preference-replytool:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]] in the section titled {{msg-mw|prefs-discussion}}, in the same list with:
* {{msg-mw|Discussiontools-preference-newtopictool}}.

Used as label for checkbox to enable the reply tool.

The help text for this checkbox is: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool-help}}
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool}}
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as label for checkbox to enable the source mode toolbar.
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool}}
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon:
Message shown when abandoning a comment

Similar to {{msg-mw|mw-widgets-abandonedit}}, {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-disc:
Label for button to abandon a comment

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic-discard}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-keep:
Label for button to cancel abandoning a comment

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic-keep}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic:
Message shown when abandoning a new topic

Similar to {{msg-mw|mw-widgets-abandonedit}}, {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Label for button to abandon a new topic

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-discard}}.

Label for button to cancel abandoning a new topic

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-keep}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-advanced: Label for button to toggle the advanced options, which shows an edit summary input and watchlist checkbox.
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning:
Warning message to be displayed when anonymous user starts writing a new topic or reply.
* $1 is a URL to log in.
* $2 is a URL to register an account.
discussiontools-replywidget-cancel:
Label for the cancel button to exit out of the widget

{{Identical|Cancel}}
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: Label for link to share feedback about the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback-lin: {{optional|Link to a page where users can share feedback about the reply widget. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}
discussiontools-replywidget-loading: Message shown while the reply widget is loading
discussiontools-replywidget-mention-pref: {{optional|Character to prefix mentions. This does not have to be the same as the trigger character, which is always '@'.}}
discussiontools-replywidget-mention-tool: Header of search results when searching for a user to mention. Parameters: * $1 – search query for the username. Note that this is not a full username, and '''can't''' be used with {{GENDER:}}.
Title text for the user mention tool.
discussiontools-replywidget-mode-source:
Label for the widget's source mode.

This should not include the word 'edit' or 'editor', and where possible should avoid 'wikitext' which is MediaWiki-specific terminology.
discussiontools-replywidget-mode-visual:
Label for the widget's visual mode.

This should not include the word 'edit' or 'editor', and should not use the product name VisualEditor.
discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic: Label for button to post a new topic
discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic-lin:
{{notranslate}}
Used by {{msg-mw|Tag-discussiontools-newtopic}} as a link to a page where users learn about the feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.
discussiontools-replywidget-placeholder-:
Placeholder describing who is being replied to.

Parameters:
* $1 – username of the person who wrote the previous comment
discussiontools-replywidget-preview: Label for the preview area of the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-reply: Label for the button to submit a reply in the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-reply-link:
{{notranslate}}
Used by {{msg-mw|Tag-discussiontools-reply}} as a link to a page where users learn about the feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: Body of the warning about typing in your signature. Parameters: * $1 – the signature markup, i.e. ~~~~ * $2 – localised keyboard shortcut to undo, for example Ctrl+Z
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-ti: Title of the warning about typing in your signature
discussiontools-replywidget-summary:
Label for the summary field that describes your comment. This will be stored as an edit summary, but in the context of the reply tool we don't want to refer to 'edits'
{{identical|Summary}}
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click:
Terms of use for posting a reply.

* $1 is the label of the button to be clicked, e.g. {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-reply}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Message explaining that the comment will be saved on a different page than the one you're viewing right now (because it was transcluded from it). Parameter: $1 – page name
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Body of notification shown when a user subscribes to a topic.
Title of notification shown when a user subscribes to a topic.
Body of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from a topic.
Title of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from a topic.
tag-discussiontools-visual:
Short description of the discussiontools-visual tag.

This should not include the word 'edit' or 'editor', and should not use the product name VisualEditor.

Shown on lists of changes (history, recentchanges, etc.) for each edit made using DiscussionTools in visual mode.

This message is always shown directly after {{msg-mw|tag-discussiontools-reply}} etc. and a comma.

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Tag-discussiontools-visual-description}}
{{Related|tag-discussiontools}}
